items.question: Can I print badges on-demand at my event?
items.answer: Yes! Our badge system supports on-demand printing for last-minute registrations and walk-ins. You can print individual badges or batches as needed.

items.question: What information can QR codes on badges contain?
items.answer: QR codes can link to digital business cards, LinkedIn profiles, session schedules, or any custom URL. You can also use them for lead capture and contact sharing.

items.question: Do you support different badge sizes and materials?
items.answer: Yes, our templates work with standard badge sizes (3.5"x2.25", 4"x3", etc.) and we provide specifications for various materials including plastic, cardstock, and specialty papers.

items.question: Can badges integrate with access control systems?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our badges can include access control features, RFID compatibility, and integration with security systems for restricted areas.
